item.title: 谷歌称将停用基于俄罗斯的 AdSense 账户
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的谷歌周一表示，将停用在俄罗斯的 AdSense 账户，无法再向该国的广告服务用户付款。【原文：Alphabet's Google is deactivating AdSense accounts in Russia, saying on Monday that it would no longer be able to make payments to users of its advertising service in the country.】

item.title: 投资基金涌入澳大利亚银行；谨慎对待矿商
item.description: 在传统上以矿业为主导的本地主要指数中，澳大利亚金融股占据主导地位，这主要是由于中国需求不佳，股票基金对大宗商品支持行业持谨慎态度，因此对金融股的兴趣与日俱增。【原文：Australian financial stocks are ruling the roost on the traditionally miners-led local main index, fueled by growing interest from equity funds that are wary of the commodity-backed sector due to poor Chinese demand.】

item.title: 据 CNBC 报道，星巴克与 Elliott 正在就和解进行谈判
item.description: 据 CNBC 周一援引消息人士的话报道，星巴克和激进投资者埃利奥特管理公司（Elliott Management）正在商讨和解事宜。【原文：Starbucks and activist investor Elliott Management are talking about a settlement, CNBC reported on Monday, citing sources.】

item.title: 雪佛龙在超高压油田开创行业先河
item.description: 雪佛龙能源公司（Chevron）周一表示，该公司实现了一项技术突破，在极高的海底压力下从美国墨西哥湾的一个油田生产出了第一批石油。【原文：Chevron has achieved a technological breakthrough, producing first oil from a U.S. Gulf of Mexico field under extreme subsea pressures, the energy company said on Monday.】

item.title: 捷蓝航空将通过发债融资逾 30 亿美元，股价下跌
item.description: 捷蓝航空公司（JetBlue Airways）周一表示，该公司计划通过单独发债筹集约 31.5 亿美元资金，其中大部分资金由其忠诚度计划 TrueBlue 支持，以努力改善其流动性。【原文：JetBlue Airways said on Monday it plans to raise about $3.15 billion in capital through separate debt offerings, the majority backed by its loyalty program, TrueBlue, as it tries to improve its liquidity.】

item.title: 环球音乐与 Meta 扩大音乐许可协议
item.description: 全球最大的音乐厂牌环球音乐集团（UMG）周一宣布与 Facebook 母公司 Meta Platforms 达成扩大协议，在 Meta 的社交平台上为旗下艺人和词曲作者创造新的机会。【原文：Universal Music Group (UMG), the world's biggest music label, announced on Monday an expanded agreement with Facebook-parent Meta Platforms to create new opportunities for its artists and songwriters across Meta's social platforms.】

item.title: Synopsys 350 亿美元的 Ansys 交易接受英国监管机构审查
item.description: 英国竞争监督机构周一表示，正在调查芯片设计软件制造商 Synopsys 以 350 亿美元收购 Ansys 是否会影响英国的竞争。【原文：UK's competition watchdog said on Monday it was looking into whether chip design software maker Synopsys' $35 billion acquisition of Ansys would affect competition in Britain.】

item.title: X公司因人工智能培训问题遭到奥地利数据使用投诉
item.description: 奥地利权益组织 NOYB 周一对社交媒体平台 X 提起诉讼，指控这家埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）旗下的公司在未经用户同意的情况下，利用用户的个人数据对其人工智能（AI）进行训练，违反了欧盟隐私法。【原文：Austrian advocacy group NOYB on Monday filed a complaint against social media platform X accusing the Elon Musk-owned company of training its artificial intelligence (AI) with users' personal data without their consent in violation of EU privacy law.】

item.title: 多伦多证券交易所（TSX）期货因大宗商品提振而上涨，美国CPI即将公布
item.description: 由于原油和金属价格上涨，与加拿大主要股指挂钩的期货周一小幅上涨，而投资者在本周晚些时候将公布的美国关键通胀数据前则保持谨慎。【原文：Futures linked to Canada's main stock index rose marginally on Monday as crude and metal prices gained, while investors exercised caution ahead of a key U.S. inflation data reading due later this week.】

item.title: 日本 SMBC 将所持杰富瑞金融公司股份增至近 11
item.description: 杰富瑞金融集团（Jefferies Financial Group）周一表示，日本三井住友银行（SMBC）已将其在这家美国投资银行的持股比例增加了一倍多，达到 10.9%，从而加深了早在 2021 年就已建立的联盟关系。【原文：Jefferies Financial Group said on Monday that Japan's Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corp (SMBC) has more than doubled its stake in the U.S. investment bank to 10.9%, deepening an alliance dating back to 2021.】

item.title: 辉瑞的 RSV 疫苗在研究中显示对免疫力低下的成人有益
item.description: 辉瑞公司周一表示，其呼吸道合胞病毒（RSV）疫苗 Abrysvo 在一项后期研究中产生了强烈的免疫反应，研究对象是四组免疫系统受损的 18 岁及以上成年人。【原文：Pfizer said on Monday its respiratory syncytial virus (RSV) vaccine Abrysvo generated a strong immune response in a late-stage study of four groups of adults aged 18 and older with a compromised immune system.】

item.title: 欧佩克以中国为由下调 2024 年石油需求增长预期
item.description: 欧佩克（OPEC）周一下调了对2024年全球石油需求增长的预期，理由是今年上半年的数据弱于预期，以及对中国的预期疲软，同时还下调了对明年的预期。【原文：OPEC on Monday cut its forecast for global oil demand growth in 2024, citing weaker than expected data for the first half of the year and softer expectations for China, and also trimmed its expectation for next year.】

item.title: 加拿大丰业银行以 28 亿美元收购美国地区性贷款机构 KeyCorp 14.9% 的股份
item.description: 丰业银行（Scotiabank）将以 28 亿美元的价格收购美国地区性贷款机构 KeyCorp 14.9% 的股份，这家加拿大银行将在饱和的本土市场之外，进军压力重重的美国银行业，寻求增长。【原文：Scotiabank is buying a 14.9% stake in American regional lender KeyCorp for $2.8 billion, as the Canadian bank taps into the stressed U.S. banking sector for growth outside its saturated home market.】

item.title: 对冲基金因担心波动加剧而缩减风险
item.description: 在经历了市场动荡的一周之后，对冲基金的投资组合经理们从一些风险较高的仓位中撤出。【原文：Portfolio managers at hedge funds have retrenched from some of their riskier positions after a volatile week for markets.】

item.title: 美国市场祈祷通胀保持良好表现
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 洞察力：马斯克拥抱特朗普，蔑视补贴。但特斯拉仍在为美国的利益游说
item.description: 当埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）上个月支持唐纳德-特朗普竞选总统时，这位特斯拉创始人兼首席执行官支持的是一位誓言 "钻井、钻井、钻井"、"结束电动汽车授权 "并减少补贴的候选人，而正是这种补贴帮助特斯拉成为美国占主导地位的电动汽车制造商。【原文：When Elon Musk endorsed Donald Trump for president last month, the Tesla founder and chief executive backed a candidate who vows to "drill, baby, drill," "end the electric vehicle mandate" and reduce subsidies of the sort that helped Tesla become the U.S.'s dominant EV manufacturer.】

item.title: 本周数据密集，CPI 成焦点，期指走势低迷
item.description: 周一，美国股指期货走势低迷，投资者正在为本周的众多数据做准备，重点关注美国消费者物价，这将为美联储 9 月份的利率走势提供有力线索。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were subdued on Monday, as investors braced for a data-packed week, with focus on U.S. consumer prices that will provide strong cues about Federal Reserve's interest rate move in September.】

item.title: 拜登将解决求助热线等待时间问题，推动消费者权益保护工作
item.description: 拜登政府周一公布了针对消费者烦恼的新规定和新措施，包括难以取消的订阅、繁琐的保险表格以及无法接通客服人员的电话等。【原文：The Biden administration on Monday unveiled new rules and efforts targeting consumer annoyances ranging from hard-to-cancel subscriptions, cumbersome insurance forms, and not being able to get a live customer service agent on the phone.】

item.title: 独家报道数十亿美元和欧元钞票不顾制裁抵达俄罗斯
item.description: 路透社看到的海关数据显示，自 2022 年 3 月乌克兰入侵后美国和欧盟禁止向俄罗斯出口其纸币以来，已有约 23 亿美元的美元和欧元纸币被运往俄罗斯。【原文：Around $2.3 billion in dollar and euro bills have been shipped to Russia since the United States and EU banned the export of their banknotes there in March 2022 following the invasion of Ukraine, according to customs data seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 消息人士称，StanChart 将产业团队并入并购部门，裁员 20 多人
item.description: 一位直接了解此事的消息人士告诉路透社，渣打银行已将其行业覆盖团队并入专门的并购咨询团队，在全球范围内裁撤了 20 多个职位，以减少重复。【原文：Standard Chartered has folded its industries coverage team into its dedicated mergers and acquisitions advisory team, eliminating more than 20 roles globally to reduce duplication, a source with direct knowledge of the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 越南计划为电动汽车充电站提供电力补贴
item.description: 越南正计划为电动汽车（EV）充电站提供电价补贴，作为其推广使用电动汽车和履行能源转型承诺努力的一部分。【原文：Vietnam is planning to subsidise electricity prices for electric vehicle (EV) charging stations, as part of its efforts to promote the use of EVs and meet its energy transition commitments.】

item.title: 新西兰央行本周开始降息的真实可能性
item.description: 由于通胀放缓、失业率上升和经济增长依然疲软，新西兰央行可能会在周三降息，这比央行的前瞻性指导提前了整整一年，从而促使市场对宽松政策持观望态度。【原文：New Zealand's central bank may cut interest rates on Wednesday, a whole year earlier than its own forward guidance, as inflation slows, unemployment rises and economic growth remains anaemic, prompting markets to punt on an easing.】

item.title: 监管机构被指控 "兴登堡 "事件后，阿达尼股价缩水 24 亿美元
item.description: 印度企业集团阿达尼集团（Adani Group）去年因兴登堡研究公司（Hindenburg Research）的一份报告而受到冲击，在做空者指责印度市场监管机构负责人与该集团也在使用的离岸基金有联系之后，阿达尼集团周一再次面临严重的股票抛售。【原文：Adani Group, the Indian conglomerate rocked by a Hindenburg Research report last year, faced another heavy share selloff on Monday after the shortseller accused the head of India's market regulator of having links to offshore funds also used by the group.】

item.title: 电动汽车起火引发消费者恐慌，韩国召开紧急会议
item.description: 周一，韩国官员开会讨论电动汽车安全问题，以及是否要求汽车公司披露电池品牌，因为电动汽车在地下车库起火，大面积烧毁了一栋公寓楼，这引起了越来越多消费者的关注。【原文：South Korean officials met on Monday to discuss electric vehicle safety and whether to require car firms to disclose battery brands amid growing consumer concern after an EV blaze in an underground garage extensively damaged an apartment block.】

item.title: 早间竞价市场转入假日氛围
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole】

item.title: 低空经济起飞，中国试飞最大货运无人机
item.description: 中国试飞了迄今为止最大的民用无人驾驶货运飞机，世界顶级无人机制造国正加紧试飞自主飞行器（UAV），这些飞行器最终可运送从外卖到人员等各种物品。【原文：China flew its biggest-yet unmanned cargo aircraft designed for civilian use, as the world's top drone-making nation steps up test flights of autonomous aerial vehicles (UAVs) that could ultimately ferry everything from takeouts to people.】

item.title: 必和必拓、力拓和澳航将向澳大利亚碳信用基金投资 5,300 万美元
item.description: 必和必拓、力拓和澳航（Qantas）周一发表声明称，作为澳大利亚碳信用额基金的早期投资者，必和必拓、力拓和澳航将总共投资 8000 万澳元（5270 万美元），该基金旨在投资土地再造林项目。【原文：BHP , Rio Tinto and Qantas will invest a total of A$80 million ($52.7 million) as early-stage investors in an Australian carbon credits fund that aims to invest in land reforestation projects, according to statements from the fund and the companies on Monday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行强调经济和政策预测的不确定性
item.description: 澳大利亚央行周一表示，经济预测存在巨大的不确定性，这是决策者在等待更多数据的同时维持利率不变的原因之一。【原文：Australia's central bank said on Monday economic forecasts were subject to huge uncertainty, one reason that policymakers have stayed the course on interest rates while waiting for more data.】

item.title: 中国凯撒集团清算听证会被香港法院延期
item.description: 香港一家法院周一将凯撒集团（Kaisa Group）申请清算的听证会延期至 9 月 9 日，从而使这家陷入困境的中国开发商有更多时间与部分债券持有人就其债务重组计划达成协议。【原文：A Hong Kong court on Monday adjourned a hearing into a petition seeking liquidation of Kaisa Group until Sept. 9, giving the embattled Chinese developer more time to reach agreement with some bondholders on its debt restructuring plan.】

item.title: 日元下滑，市场为美国通胀数据做好准备
item.description: 由于日本周一假期，市场参与者对美联储下月大幅降息的可能性仍持矛盾态度，日元兑美元汇率在交易中略微走软。【原文：The yen was a tad softer against the dollar in trading thinned by a Japanese holiday on Monday, with market participants still ambivalent about the odds of a big Fed rate cut next month.】
